description: Your layering system evolves dramatically with changes in the season and sport, but the Polartec® Power Grid™ FZ Hoody is the faithful standby that never leaves the lineup. From mid-winter ice climbs and ski tours to shoulder season bouldering and backpacking, the Power Grid is Mountain Hardwear's most technical midlayer fleece featuring 60% recycled polyester and a classic grid-backer construction that traps warmth and aids in moisture management.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec Power Grid Full Zip Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Polartec® Power Grid™ - 60% Recycled Polyester, 33% Polyester, 7% Elastane
